hackathon-description-text: Welcome to the first ever McWiCS hackathon! Our theme is improving student life. Here is the schedule of the event:
hackathon-eligibility: Anyone is welcome to participate in our hackathon! We do ask that teams are kept to a maximum of 4 participants.
hackathon-requirements: Our theme is improving the lives of students, however the theme is a suggestion and you can create whatever you'd like.
hackathon-rules:
Our hackathon is dedicated to providing a harassment-free space for everyone, regardless of the following:
We will not tolerate harassment of any form.
Hackathon participants violating this will be sanctioned or expelled from the hackathon at the discretion of the hackathon organisers.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Hack the Best Fits the Theme

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=51 Rue Sherbrooke O, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-location-address: 51 Rue Sherbrooke O, Montréal, QC H2X 1X2, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Create something to improve student life.
